structure.unit: RIGHTS OF ACTION AND SURVIVAL OF ACTIONS

law.catch_line: Effect of notice of claim on statute of limitations.
law.text: If a written notice of claim is served under KRS 411.276, then the statute of limitation for the underlying action is tolled until seventy-five (75) days after the expiration of the time frame agreed to by the parties under KRS 411.276(2), or the date established for inspection pursuant to KRS 411.276(2)(a), or the expiration of the time frame contained in KRS 411.276(4)(b), whichever occurs later.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 27, effective July 13, 2004.
